Task ID:
\h(《Aika》)The Harpoon Cannon is ready to fire!
It uses up a lot of Spirit, but it's capable
of inflicting massive amounts of damage!\c

\h(《Aika》)If you can get behind the enemy, we might have
a chance to use the Harpoon Cannon!\c

\h(《Vyse》)We can't leave anything to chance…
Just keep going on this course!\c

\h(《Baluan Battleship》)I've heard of you, Vyse!
You Air Pirates think you can resist Balua? I'll
send you screaming through the clouds below!!!\c

\h(《Vyse》)Alright!  Let's try and get behind 'em.
The Harpoon Cannon should open up a nice hole
in the belly of their ship…\c

\h(《Aika》)Aye aye, captain!  Just line up the 4 arrows of
the Harpoon Cannon and fire!\c

\h(《Aika》)Oh no!
We let the enemies get behind us!\e

\h(《Vyse》)Oh great…
We have to pay more attention!\c

\h(《Fina》)When the gauge of a certain area turns red, that
means the enemy is aiming for it with their
cannon!  Be careful!\c
